flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.summary: Building blocks on a pin board like Legos . K the blocks have pins . Select a location . ( game select material ) take stinger and weld a beed. (test in game weld to get better )  Get better and level up to buildings and sky scrapers . Build and share
guide.title: Making Welding game
